mainBoard.name: Ajani's Pridemate
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

rulings.text: Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Ajani's Pridemate's ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, planeswalkers, and/or battles at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
If Ajani's Pridemate is dealt lethal damage at the same time that you gain life, it won't receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.
If you gain an amount of life "for each" of something or "equal to the number" of something, that life is gained as one event and Ajani's Pridemate's ability triggers only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won't cause Ajani's Pridemate's ability to trigger, even though it caused your team's life total to increase.
The ability of Ajani's Pridemate triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it's 1 life from Dazzling Angel or 4 life from Apothecary Stomper.

mainBoard.name: Paladin of Atonement
mainBoard.originalText:
At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Paladin of Atonement.
When Paladin of Atonement dies, you gain life equal to its toughness.

rulings.text: Paladin of Atonement’s first ability cares only whether you lost life last turn, even if Paladin of Atonement wasn’t on the battlefield when that happened. It doesn’t care how much you lost, whether you also gained life, or even whether you gained more life than you lost.

To determine how much life you gain for the last ability, use Paladin of Atonement’s toughness as it last existed on the battlefield. If its toughness was less than 0, you won’t gain life. (You also won’t lose life.).

mainBoard.name: Resplendent Angel
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 5 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
{3}{W}{W}{W}: Until end of turn, Resplendent Angel gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink.

rulings.text: If you didn't gain life during the turn before the end step begins, Resplendent Angel's triggered ability won't trigger at all. Gaining life during the end step won't cause the ability to trigger.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won't satisfy Resplendent Angel's triggered ability, even though it caused your team's life total to increase.

Resplendent Angel's triggered ability checks if you gained 5 or more life total during the turn. It doesn't matter if you also lost life or whether your life total is greater than it was at the beginning of the turn. It also doesn't matter whether Resplendent Angel was on the battlefield when any of the life gain happened.
You create only one Angel token, no matter how many times you gained 5 or more life.
You don't need to have gained 5 life all at once to satisfy Resplendent Angel's triggered ability.

mainBoard.name: Epicure of Blood
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.

rulings.text: Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Epicure of Blood's ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, and/or planeswalkers at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Epicure of Blood's ability causes the opposing team to lose 1 life twice.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won't cause the ability to trigger, even though it caused your team's life total to increase.

The ability of Epicure of Blood triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it's 1 life from Impassioned Orator or 4 life from Dawning Angel. If you gain an amount of life "for each" of something or "equal to the number" of something, that life is gained as one event and the ability of Epicure of Blood triggers only once.

foreignData.name: 瓦絲卡的藐視
foreignData.text: 放逐目標生物或鵬洛客。你獲得2點生命。

foreignData.flavorText: Les tavernes de La Rade se firent bientôt l'écho de la rumeur d'une nouvelle capitaine capable de transformer quelqu'un en pierre d'un simple regard.
foreignData.name: Mépris de Vraska
foreignData.text: Exilez la créature ciblée ou le planeswalker ciblé. Vous gagnez 2 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Schon bald kursierten im Hafen am Ende der Welt die wildesten Gerüchte über die neue Kapitänin, die jemanden mit nur einem Blick zu Stein erstarren lassen konnte.
foreignData.name: Vraskas Verachtung
foreignData.text: Schicke eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl ins Exil. Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: Ben presto, nelle taverne della Secca si cominciò a mormorare della nuova capitana in grado di trasformare la gente in pietra con un solo sguardo.
foreignData.name: Disprezzo di Vraska
foreignData.text: Esilia una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio. Guadagni 2 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 一睨みで人を石に変える新船長の話題が、孤高街のどの酒場でも囁かれるようになるまで、長くはかからなかった。
foreignData.name: ヴラスカの侮辱
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。あなたは２点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 얼마 지나지 않아 하이 앤 드라이의 선술집들은 쳐다보는 것만으로 사람을 돌로 만든다는 신임 선장에 대한 소문으로 들끓었다.
foreignData.name: 브라스카의 경멸
foreignData.text: 생물이나 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 추방한다. 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Não levou muito tempo para que as tavernas de Banco de Areia se enchessem de murmúrios sobre a nova capitã capaz de transformar as pessoas em pedra com um olhar.
foreignData.name: Desprezo de Vraska
foreignData.text: Exile a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo. Você ganha 2 pontos de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Прошло совсем немного времени, и в тавернах Города-на-Мели шепотом заговорили о новом капитане, способном одним взглядом обратить в камень.
foreignData.name: Презрение Враски
foreignData.text: Изгоните целевое существо или planeswalker-а. Вы получаете 2 жизни.

foreignData.flavorText: No pasó mucho tiempo hasta que las tabernas de Zabordada se llenaron de rumores sobre la nueva capitana que podía convertir a alguien en piedra con una sola mirada.
foreignData.name: Desprecio de Vraska
foreignData.text: Exilia la criatura o planeswalker objetivo. Ganas 2 vidas.

mainBoard.name: Vraska's Contempt
mainBoard.originalText: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: If the target creature or planeswalker is an illegal target by the time Vraska’s Contempt resolves, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain life.

There are many important moments in the story, but the most crucial—called “story spotlights”—are shown on cards. These cards have the Planeswalker symbol in their text box; this symbol has no effect on gameplay. You can read more about these events in the official Magic fiction at http://www.mtgstory.com.

mainBoard.flavorText: Serra's blessing lies strongest upon Sursi, where her holy chapels are untouched even as the Cabal encroaches.

foreignData.flavorText: 撒拉的祝福在苏西最为强大，就连在柯帮侵袭时，其神圣礼拜堂仍能屹立不摇。
foreignData.name: 孤立礼拜堂
foreignData.text:
除非你操控平原或沼泽，否则孤立礼拜堂须横置进战场。
{T}：加{W}或{B}。

foreignData.flavorText: 撒拉的祝福在蘇西最為強大，就連在柯幫侵襲時，其神聖禮拜堂仍能屹立不搖。
foreignData.name: 孤立禮拜堂
foreignData.text:
除非你操控平原或沼澤，否則孤立禮拜堂須橫置進戰場。

foreignData.flavorText: La bénédiction de Serra est particulièrement puissante à Sursi, où ses saintes chapelles restent intactes malgré l'approche de la Coterie.
foreignData.name: Chapelle isolée
foreignData.text:
La Chapelle isolée arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez une plaine ou un marais.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {B}.

foreignData.flavorText: Serras Segen wirkt am stärksten in Sursi, wo ihre heiligen Kapellen unberührt stehen, trotz des Vormarsches der Kabbalisten.
foreignData.name: Isolierte Kapelle
foreignData.text:
Die Isolierte Kapelle kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst eine Ebene oder einen Sumpf.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {B}.

foreignData.flavorText: È a Sursi che la benedizione di Serra perdura più potente: qui le sue cappelle sacre sono rimaste intatte nonostante l'invasione della Cabala.
foreignData.name: Cappella Isolata
foreignData.text:
La Cappella Isolata entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli una Pianura o una Palude.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o {B}.

foreignData.flavorText: セラの祝福は最も強くサーシに注ぐ。その地にはセラの聖教会があるが、侵入してくる陰謀団も手が出せない。
foreignData.name: 孤立した礼拝堂
foreignData.text:
孤立した礼拝堂は、あなたが平地か沼をコントロールしていないかぎり、タップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{W}か{B}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 세라의 축복은 수르시를 굳건하게 지키며, 그녀의 성스러운 예배실은 도당의 침략 때도 피해를 입지 않았다.
foreignData.name: 외딴 예배당
foreignData.text:
외딴 예배당은 당신이 들이나 늪을 조종하지 않으면 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {W} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.

foreignData.flavorText: A bênção de Serra é mais forte em Sursi, onde suas capelas sagradas permanecem intocadas mesmo com o avanço da Cabala.
foreignData.name: Capela Isolada
foreignData.text:
Capela Isolada entra no campo de batalha virada, a menos que você controle uma Planície ou um Pântano.
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {B}.

foreignData.flavorText: Благословение Серры сильнее всего пало на Сурси — здесь ее священные часовни остаются нетронутыми, даже когда наступают кабалы.
foreignData.name: Уединенная Часовня
foreignData.text:
Уединенная Часовня выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если под вашим контролем нет Равнины или Болота.
{T}: добавьте {W} или {B}.

foreignData.flavorText: La bendición de Serra es más intensa en Sursi, cuyas capillas sagradas permanecen intactas a pesar de las invasiones de la Cábala.

foreignData.text:
La Capilla aislada entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles una Llanura o un Pantano.
{T}: Agrega {W} o {B}.
